add.message: Add a task to the active list where `task` is the task to add.

remove.message: Remove the highlighted task from the active list.

edit.message: Edit the highlighted task from the active list. Replace the highlighted with `newtask`.

openList.message: Open or create a list where `list` is the name of the list.

deleteList.message: Delete the active list. This action is permanent.

renameList.message: Rename the active list where `newname` is the new name of the list.

closeList.message: Close the active list. Can be opened again with `/openList`.

lists.message: Show a list of all the lists.

theme.message: Change the theme of the app where `theme` is the name of the theme. Many base-16 themes are supported, see the list here: https://glitchbone.github.io/vscode-base16-term/#/
